I'd been watching these; the black pair went on sale, so I jumped in. They are excellent shoes for day-to-day or travel wear. I've worn then on long trips (on the train, or driving) and at a conference with a lot of walking. I've ridden my bike in them & run errands in them. They work well. At first, they were a little tight, especially at the "tongue" -- the top front of the opening. That sometimes rolled under at first, but after a few wears, the shoe relaxed and molded a bit more to my foot. I wear these shoes a lot; they are comfortable and reasonably good-looking -- thinking about more colors.
